tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nutrient_consumption (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nutrient_name VARCHAR(50),
  consumption_quantity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE nutrient_consumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    nutrient_type VARCHAR(20),
    consumed_amount DECIMAL,
    consumed_date DATE
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    username TEXT NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE nutrient_consumption (
    consumption_id UUID NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    nutrient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    consumed_amount DECIMAL,
    consumption_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (consumption_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE nutrient_recommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID NOT NULL,
    nutrient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    recommended_amount DECIMAL,
    age_range TEXT,
    gender TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (recommendation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles(
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE food_entries(
    entry_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    food_name VARCHAR(50),
    serving_size FLOAT,
    calories INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE nutrient_info(
    nutrient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    nutrient_name VARCHAR(50),
    daily_recommendation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE user_nutrient_consumption(
    user_id UUID REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    nutrient_id UUID REFERENCES nutrient_info(nutrient_id),
    consumed_quantity FLOAT,
    date_consumed DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, nutrient_id, date_consumed)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE food_items (
    food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    calories INT,
    protein FLOAT,
    fat FLOAT,
    carbohydrates FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_food_consumption (
    user_id INT,
    food_id INT,
    consumption_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, food_id, consumption_date),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (food_id) REFERENCES food_items(food_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_daily_intake (
    user_id INT,
    intake_date DATE,
    total_calories_consumed INT,
    total_protein_consumed FLOAT,
    total_fat_consumed FLOAT,
    total_carbohydrates_consumed FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, intake_date),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_goals (
    user_id INT,
    goal_date DATE,
    target_calories INT,
    target_protein FLOAT,
    target_fat FLOAT,
    target_carbohydrates FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, goal_date),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
